name: Mackerel Fillets Simmered in Soy Sauce
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons rice vinegar or white wine vinegar
5 or 6 thin slices peeled fresh ginger
4 mackerel fillets, about 1 pound total, skin on

recipeInstructions.text: In a 12-inch skillet with a cover, mix together all ingredients except fish, rice and scallions. Add 1/2 cup water. Bring to a boil and simmer over medium heat for about 5 minutes, uncovered.

Add fish skin-side down and simmer until cooked through, 7 to 10 minutes. (You can hasten cooking a bit by covering pan, but it is not necessary.) Spoon a fillet and some sauce onto a mound of white rice; garnish and serve.
